content: Hi! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. May I have your full name to get started?
Thank you, Greg! Can you please provide your address so we can check if you’re in our service area?
Oh, yeah, it’s 782 Broadmeadow Lane, Springfield.
Great, thanks! What kind of problem are you experiencing? Could you describe the job you’d like help with?
Uh, it’s, well, it’s uh, my thing isn’t working right and it’s just, something’s wrong, you know?
No worries, just to make sure we get you the right help—could you tell me if it’s related to your heating, cooling, plumbing, or electrical system?
It’s just... not cool. The air’s not cold. It’s hot? Or not, I mean, kind of a cold heat but... I don’t really know how to explain it.

I understand—it sounds like you might be having an issue with your air conditioning or HVAC. Could you tell me more specifically what’s happening, like odd noises, error messages, or if it's not turning on at all?
Ummm. I, uh, can I just talk to someone? I'm not really sure what to say.
I’m here to help. If you’re not sure about the details, that’s okay! Can you describe any sounds, smells, or if the system is running at all? Just anything you notice can help.
reason: Customer unable to provide sufficient job description; requested human help.

content: Hi Greg, this is Sarah from XYZ Home Services. I can help out from here. First—don’t worry! We just want to get you scheduled so our tech can take a look at your cooling system. Could you tell me if your AC unit is running at all or making any unusual sounds?
